Articles.Content:
So I've finished off the beginning of my new film, Antarctica and I've made a trailer just to get the word out and make sure people are hyped. Hope you enjoy.

It is indeed a pretty bad trailer, and probably reveals too much of the story. And yes, in case you have watched the 'Build, Fly, Dream' trailer, it's basically just a rip off of that... What can I say? I did this in the 30 minutes I had spare when I wasn't working on the film. Now, some actual words about the movie; Antarctica is a very long form narrative film focused around Jeb and Bill's journey to the South Pole and the shenanigans they find themselves in. There is also a deeper sub-plot to the film... one of friendship, loss and revenge. Wow... that makes it sound pretty deep. I also feel the need to give a quick thank you to Rune; who built the awesome VTOL seen in the clip

This film is also a testimony to my first long-form cinematic: 'STRANDED'. Well over twice as long:

'Antarctica' has improved on it's predecessor in story, special effects, audio and hopefully the ability

to the make the viewer smile

Edited July 6, 2014 by HatBat
Can't wait to see it! Finally a mature story in a KSP movie!
